list_definition.definition: a list of people etc who are out of favour/favor

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: Countries that failed to cooperate were placed on a blacklist

list_definition.definition: to put (a person etc) on such a list

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: The actor was blacklisted because of his political beliefs.
